definition: a building or group of buildings used to house military personnel, to laugh at with contempt and derision
details:
noun
- a building or group of buildings used to house military personnel
verb
- to laugh at with contempt and derision
= example: to laugh at with contempt and derision
= synonyms: jeer, scoff, gibe, flout
- to spur on or encourage especially by cheers and shouts
= example: to spur on or encourage especially by cheers and shouts
= synonyms: cheer, urge, inspire, pep up, urge on, exhort, root on
- to lodge in barracks
= example: to lodge in barracks
